data.title: Senior Wire Baskets
data.meta-description: New Senior Wire Baskets For Sale at ASI, 48 Hr Quick Ship, 20" Deep x 32" Wide x 22" Overall Height, 1/2 Front Drop Gate, Low Price Guarantee and Nationwide shipping on our new wire baskets

div.h3: WorldTainer Senior Wire Baskets: Common-Sense, Scalable Bulk Storage
div.p: New Senior Wire Baskets For Sale at American Surplus are in stock. These senior wire baskets measure 40" Deep x 48" Wide and have a 36" Overall Height. They are part of a 48 hour quick ship program and we have multiple shipping points across the country to get you the best possible freight quote. These wire baskets are welded with a 2" x 2" mesh pattern, and have a standard 1/2 drop gate on the front of the wire basket. They have an ability to collapse for storage when not in use and they can stack on top of one another to save space and stay organized. Call our sales team for more information, or request a quote online now to get started.

American Surplus is proud to carry WorldTainer Wire Containers, the #1-selling wire basket in the world. WorldTainer manufactures each wire container to deliver superior strength, quality, and durability every time. With our factory direct connections and over 25 years of experience, we can pass more savings and quality onto you than anyone else in the industry! Call or request a quote today and see the difference American Surplus and WorldTainer can make for you AND your wallet!

p.strong: Custom designs and finishes are available, talk to our sales team! We can’t list our entire inventory online, if you do not see what you are looking for, just ask! Quantity discounts available on new wire baskets. Call 800-876-3736 for additional information & a free quote. Nationwide shipping is available. Price and product availability subject to change without notice. Inventory is subject to prior sale.
